constraints.name: probability_proportional_to_weight
constraints.description: 每个元素被选中的概率与其权重成正比

constraints.name: weight_adjustment_based_on_preference
constraints.description: 根据偏好调整权重：喜欢的元素权重加1，不喜欢的元素权重减1

constraints.name: expected_value_modulo
constraints.description: 期望值需要对给定模数取模

constraints.name: at_least_one_preferred_element
constraints.description: 至少存在一个偏好元素
